LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack_Meat.label: carnivore packaged survival meal
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack_Meat.description: A high-quality carnivore packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack_Veg.label: vegetarian packaged survival meal
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack_Veg.description: A high-quality vegetarian packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Great for traveling.
